paragraphs: <italic>The actual title reads "Letter from Jarl [Jarl name]," which the game fills in with the appropriate name. Same thing happens to the italics below. Found in the Hearthfire DLC.</italic>

<italic>As a mark of the high esteem in which you are held by me and my people, I would like to offer you an opportunity to become a landowner in [Hold name]. A choice piece of undeveloped land in the hold has just become available. Please contact me if you are interested in purchasing it.</italic>
